title: DAMASHA: Detecting AI in Mixed Adversarial Texts via Segmentation with Human-interpretable Attribution
authors: L. D. M. S. Sai Teja
summary: In the age of advanced large language models (LLMs), the boundaries between human and AI-generated text are becoming increasingly blurred. We address the challenge of segmenting mixed-authorship text, that is identifying transition points in text where authorship shifts from human to AI or vice-versa, a problem with critical implications for authenticity, trust, and human oversight.
